channel.title: HeLP! with using item on objects for xp
channel.description:
ok so im working on makeing it so if u use bones on a altar it gives you xp. i also need the item to erase after used thanks. btw im running a 317 and its not delta its nullpkz
object code- 412 item code- 4834 skill #- 5

item.title: HeLP! with using item on objects for xp
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

xxlukexx:

he said delta.

I don’t care.
He should be able to rename the variables himself, unless he’s mentally challenged.

It’s amazing how nice the conventions are on Delta too. (Sarcasm.)

Capitalized variables, disgusts me.

Read full topic

item.title: HeLP! with using item on objects for xp

item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

This goes in case 192.

if(objectId == 412) { if(itemId == 4834) { deleteItem(4834, 1); addSkillXP(Howmuchexp, 5); sendMessage("Your message"); startAnimation(Youremote, 0); } }

Edit: Oh, he posted it before I did, lol.

item.title: HeLP! with using item on objects for xp
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

this should be already in your server…

and if not, would be something like:

if(UsedOnObjectID == 412){ if(ItemID == 4834){ deleteItem(4834, 1); addSkillXP(8*getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), 5); sM("You receive some prayer experience."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } }
